mapper.select: SELECT WORKIDX, ATDNO, ATDCODE AS VACATIONCODE, EMPNO, WORKDATE, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS, ETC FROM work_schedule WHERE empNo = #{empNo}
select * from work_schedule where empNo = #{empNo} and workDate LIKE CONCAT('%', #{workMonth}, '%')
select * from work_schedule where EMPNO = #{empNo} and workDate = #{date}

SELECT ws.WORKIDX, ws.EMPNO, ws.atdCode AS vacationCode, ws.WORKDATE, hr.DEPTNAME, hr.ENAME, ws.STARTTIME, ws.ENDTIME, ws.STATUS, ws.ETC FROM WORK_SCHEDULE ws JOIN HRM hr ON ws.EMPNO = hr.EMPNO ORDER BY ws.WORKDATE DESC

mapper.select: SELECT ws.WORKIDX, a.ATDNO, a.ATDCODE, ws.EMPNO, ws.WORKDATE, ws.STARTTIME, ws.ENDTIME, ws.STATUS, ws.ETC FROM WORK_SCHEDULE ws JOIN ATTEND a ON ws.EMPNO = a.EMPNO Where workDate = CURDATE()
